name: Constella (Mr.P29)
description:
The constellations have been lost, but the Constella has given the power to find them again.
It is a puzzle-platformer with a celestial theme!
Controls:
Arrow keys or WASD to move, Mouse to select stars, Backspace to return to Skymap.
The skymap can be scrolled left and right with the appropriate keys.

Only 3 constellations are complete, and game does not automatically end when they are completed.
